94-95-96 k10 row 14 k14 row 61 k1 sko k22 sko k1 row 97 k1 sko k4 sko k1 row 15 k1 kfb k10 kfb k1 row 62-63-64 k26 row 98-99-100 k8 row 16 k16 row 65 k1 sko k20 sko k1 row 101 cast off8 and cut the yarn at 5-7cm 2 -3 row 17 k1 kfb k12 kfb k1 row 66-67-68 k24 row 18-19-20 k18 row 69 k1 sko k18 sko k1 flap garter stitch cast on 5st pick up all stitches from the upper lip of the slot and cast on 5 more st knit 13-15 row in garter stitch cast off all the stitches froggybug 2-in-1 seahorse v3 page 3 of 16 tail mostly garter stitch short row the tail is made of a straight section of 6 identical segments and 5 curved sections of 4 identical segments each the segments are marked by a vertical line of stockinette stitch in yellow on the chart increases / decreases on the curved sections are on every row on the right side where the markers are knit they are a lot easier to spot the straight section is made of short row adding a segment at each turn detailed instructions in the below w means wrap yarn in the back slip 1 purl wise yarn in the front turn the work the p and k are the segments / markers they are knit on the right side row 1 3 5 and so on and purled on the wrong side row 2 4 6 and so on number of remaining stitches after wrapping are indicated into brackets cast on 74 row 1 k74 row 2 p k4 p w row 3 s k k4 k row 4 repeat 2x p k4 p w row 5 s k repeat 2x k4 k row 6 repeat 3x p k4 p w row 7 s k repeat 3x k4 k row 8 repeat 4x p k4 p w row 9 s k repeat 4x k4 k row 10 repeat 5x p k4 p w row 11 s k repeat 5x k4 k row 12 repeat 6x p k4 p w row 13 s k repeat 6x k4 k row 14 repeat 6x p k4 repeat 4x p k3 repeat 4x p k2 repeat 4x p k1 p k8 row 15 repeat 8x kfb k repeat 4x kfb k repeat 4x k1 kfb k repeat 4x k2 kfb k repeat 6x k4 k row 16 repeat 10x p k4 repeat 4x p k3 repeat 4x p k2 repeat 4x p k1 p w remain 6 row 17 s k repeat 4x kfb k repeat 4x k1 kfb k repeat 4x k2 kfb k
